data.text: Moses ga helekai gi Dimaadua, “Dolomaa digau Israel la ga hagalee hagadonu au, ga hagalee hagalongo mai, ga helekai mai boloo: Dimaadua la digi haga gidee Ia gi di goe.”
Gei Dimaadua ga helekai, “Ma di aha dela i doo lima?”
Gei Dimaadua ga helekai, “Hudua gi hongo di gelegele.”
Gei Dimaadua ga helekai gi mee, “Hagadaudae ina adu doo lima. Kumidia di hugu o maa.”

Gei Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses, “Heia di mee deenei, gei digaula ga haga donu laa bolo ma ko Au dela go Yihowah, go di God o nadau damana mmaadua, go di God o Abraham, di God o Isaac mo di God o Jacob dela ne haga gida adu gi di goe.”
Dimaadua ga helekai labelaa, “Daalo doo lima gi lodo doo gahu.” Gei Moses gu daalo. Dono madagoaa ne haga mmuu mai dono lima gi daha, gei dono lima guu magi genegene, gu kene hua be ‘snow’.
Gei Dimaadua ga helekai gi mee, “Wanga ina labelaa doo lima la gi lodo doo gahu.” Gei Moses guu wanga labelaa, gei di maa guu hili, gu hai hua be di hoo dono lima.
Dimaadua ga helekai, “Maa digaula hagalee hagadonu goe i di mogobuna matagidagi, gei digaula ga hagadonu laa i di mogobuna i nomuli.

Maa digaula hagalee hagadonu nia mogobuna haga goboina e lua aanei, ge hagalee hagalongo gi au helekai, gei goe ga huai aga au wai i di monowai Nile, gaa dui gi hongo di gelegele maangoo. Nia wai aalaa la gaa huli gaa hai nia dodo.”

Gei Moses ga helekai gi Dimaadua, “Meenei Tagi, Goe hudee hagau ina au. Au tangada de wouwou di leelee. Au mee aanaa e helekai mai gi di au dolomeenei, e deemee labelaa di hai ko au. Au e huaidu dogu helehelekai, e buna gei e nonoogia.”
Dimaadua ga helekai gi mee, “Ma koai dela ne hai di ngudu o tangada? Ma koai dela e hai tangada gi longoduli, ge e hai gi de leelee, be e hai gi gidee ia be gi dee gida? Ma ko Au go Dimaadua!
Hana dolomeenei. Au e hana dalia goe e hagamaamaa i dau helehelekai, ga aago adu laa au mee ala e helekai iei goe.”
Gei Moses ga helekai, “Meenei Tagi, dumaalia mai. Hagau ina dau huai dangada e hai dau hegau.”

Gei Dimaadua gu hagawelewele gi Moses, ga helekai, “Do duaahina daane go Aaron tangada o Levi? Au e iloo bolo mee e mee di helekai. Mee gu hanimoi belee heetugi adu gi di goe, gei mee ga tenetene i di gulu madagoaa ma ga heetugi.
Goe hagi anga ina nia mee ala belee helekai iei mee. Au ga hagamaamaa laa goolua i lodo gulu helekai, gei Au ga hagi adu nia mee huogodoo ala belee hai go goolua.
Mee ga pono laa goe ga helekai i mua digau dogologo, guu ala be go doo ngudu, gei goe guu ala be di God ni mee.
Kae ina dau dogodogo dalia goe, deelaa dau mee e hai ai au mogobuna.”

Nomuli gei Moses gaa hana gi muli gi baahi o Jethro go tamana dono lodo, ga helekai gi mee, “Dumaalia mai gi di au e hana gi baahi ogu daangada donu ala e noho i Egypt, gi gidee au be digaula e mouli hua igolo.” Jethro ga helekai, “Hana i di aumaalia.”
Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses i Midian, “Hana labelaa gi Egypt, idimaa, digau huogodoo ala bolo e daaligi goe gii made, la guu mmade.”
Malaa, Moses ga haga uda dono lodo mo ana dama daane gi hongo di ‘donkey’, gaa hula gi Egypt. Geia e kae togodogo a God ne hai gi mee bolo gi kae ina.

Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses, “Goe ma gaa dau i Egypt, gei goe heia nia mogobuna ala ne gowadu ko Au bolo gi heia kooe i mua di king. Au ga haga hamaaloo laa dono manawa gi de hiihai di dugu adu digau Israel gii hula gi daha mo ia.
Goe ga helekai gi di king bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua dela ne helekai boloo, ‘Israel la di tama madua ni aagu.
Au ne helekai bolo goe gi dugua digau Israel gii hula e daumaha mai gi di Au, gei goe gu dagalili bolo digaula hagalee hula. Malaa, gei Au ga daaligi dau ulu madua daane gii made.’”4.23 Exodus 12.29
Dimaadua gu heetugi gi Moses i di gowaa o mee ne hagamolooloo i dono ala nogo hana ai gi Egypt, ga daaligi a mee bolo gii made.

Gei Zipporah ga dahi aga dana dama hadugalaa gaa, ga sirkumsais dana dama daane, ga hagatale di gilibege ne tuu gi daha gi nia babaawae o Moses. Mai i di hai o di sirkumsais, gei Zipporah ga helekai gi Moses, “Goe go dogu lodo mai i nia dodo.”
Dimaadua ga helekai gi Aaron, “Hana e heetugi gi Moses i lodo di anggowaa.” Geia gaa hana ga heetugi gi Moses i baahi di gonduu haga madagu a God, gaa hongi ginaua.
Moses ga hagamodongoohia gi Aaron nia mee huogodoo a Dimaadua ala e hagau gineia belee hai, mo nia mogobuna huogodoo bolo gi heia.
Malaa, Moses mo Aaron gaa hula gi Egypt, ga haga dagabuli nia dagi o digau Israel huogodoo gi di gowaa e dahi.
Gei Aaron gaa kai gi digaula nia helekai a Dimaadua ne hagi anga gi Moses, gei Moses gaa hai labelaa nia mogobuna huogodoo i mua digaula.
Digaula gu hagadonu, gei digaula gaa pala gi lala ga daumaha gi Dimaadua, mai i di nadau iloo bolo Dimaadua la gu hanimoi gei gu gidee Ia nadau duadua.
